title: Fergie throws paradise island themed 6th birthday party for son Axl
text:
Fergie celebrated her son Axl's 6th birthday with an epic celebration.

The singer threw an "Axl's Island" paradise-themed party, complete with live music, tiki huts, craft tables and a bouncy castle to celebrate her son's big day.

She shared a video of her little guy checking out the bash and greeting friends and family.

She also shared another photo smiling alongside her son, captioning the sweet shot: "Happy 6th Birthday to the love of my life."

A gallery of some of additional pictures from Axl's special day was also shared on the singer's account.

While Axl's father, actor Josh Duhamel was not photographed at the party, he took to Instagram to post his own birthday wishes for his son. "Never a dull moment with this kid," he captioned the post. "Happy Birthday, Axl Jack!"
